purpose: Enhance productivity by providing AI-driven tools and workflows that can be customized with minimal coding
principle: Integrates various AI models and tools into a cohesive platform that supports low-code/no-code development for workflow automation
reusability: Modular architecture with API support for easy integration into existing systems, supports custom workflows and extensions
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have incomplete features and stability issues, limited documentation
name: magic
description: The first open-source all-in-one AI productivity platform
highlight: Open-source all-in-one AI productivity platform with a focus on low-code and no-code workflows
